name: Andrew Lugard
description: I am a kind, caring & sensitive person looking for friendship & chats with someone around my age. I enjoy reading, Michael Connelly is one of my favorites. I also like movies & sports. I think I have a good sense of humor & love to laughing & just have fun. I could be alittle shy at first but once I know you I am your best friend. I am easy going and a good listener. I am not interested in younger women or playing
